text: CBS Broadcasting Inc. (CBS) (full name: Columbia Broadcasting System) is an American television network. Along with ABC, NBC and FOX, it is one of the country's four major television networks. ==Stations== KCBS Los Angeles, California WCBS New York, New York WBBM Chicago, Illinois ==Other websites== * Official site Category:Columbia Broadcasting System Category:Viacom Category:1927 establishments in the United States
title: CBS
